title: Amazing pen writes Franklin Gothic
content:
I guess we’ve all seen the [Helvetica Sharpie](http://web.archive.org/web/20090627073214/http:/objectifiedfilm.com/?s=sharpie&x=0&y=0)?

\*\*\*\* of America takes the idea and runs it to its [illogical retro-extreme](http://web.archive.org/web/20090627073214/http:/blogs.reuters.com/felix-salmon/2009/06/19/crap-marketing-campaign-of-the-day-merrill-lynch-edition/)...
author: sii

comments.content:
”...while Merrill Lynch, having lost its bull, is left with nothing at all...”

Some kind of poetic justice, no? Maybe the writer meant to say that ML had lost its BS...
